title: Datasets for single-source capture-recapture models
text: netherlands1995 – irregular migration Netherlands 1995. Source: van Der Heijden et al. (2003) netherlands2009 – irregular migration Netherlands 2009. Source: Cruyff, Husken & van der Heijden, P. G. (2018)

what: Irregular immigrants observed by the police in the Netherlands in 1995 — netherlands1995
title: Irregular immigrants observed by the police in the Netherlands in 1995 — netherlands1995
text: netherlands2009 data frame 1,880 rows 5 columns. dataset used van der Heijden et al. (2003). 1995 police records abovementioned four large cities registered whether apprehended illegal immigrant effectively expelled . Dataset contains irregular immigrants effectively expelled Netherlands.

title: Irregular immigrants observed by the police in the Netherlands in 1995 — netherlands1995
Irregular immigrants observed by the police in the Netherlands in 1995 — netherlands1995
text: data frame contains following columns: captures number observations individual sex Gender, coded 1=males age Age, coded 1=age > 40 reason Reason apprehended, 2 levels (1=staying without valid permit) origin Nationality, 6 levels (American Australia, Asia, North Africa, Rest Africa, Surinam, Turkey)

title: Irregular immigrants observed by the police in the Netherlands in 1995 — netherlands1995
text: van der Heijden, P. G., Bustami, R., Cruyff, M. J., Engbersen, G., & Van Houwelingen, H. C. (2003). Point interval estimation population size using truncated Poisson regression model. Statistical Modelling, 3(4), 305-322.

what: Irregular immigrants observed by the police in the Netherlands in 2009 — netherlands2009
title: Irregular immigrants observed by the police in the Netherlands in 2009 — netherlands2009
text: netherlands2009 data frame 4,257 rows 7 columns. dataset used Cruyff, Husken van der Heijden (2018). 2009 total 4,257 irregular immigrants observed police, 1,854 expelled country end year. data matched data Office Judicial Institutions (RJI) containing detention times.

title: Irregular immigrants observed by the police in the Netherlands in 2009 — netherlands2009
Irregular immigrants observed by the police in the Netherlands in 2009 — netherlands2009
text: data frame contains following columns: captures number observations individual time_risk time--risk proportional T=12 months, calculated T - entry time - detention time - expulsion time time_risk2 time--risk2 proportional T=12 months, calculated T - entry time sex Gender, coded 1=males age Age, coded 1=age > 40 region police region, 5 levels (Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Utrecht, Haaglanden, ) origin Nationality, 8 levels (Africa, America, Asia, Eastern-Europe, North-Africa, Suriname, Turkey, Unknown)

title: Irregular immigrants observed by the police in the Netherlands in 2009 — netherlands2009
text: Cruyff, M. J., Husken, T. F., & van Der Heijden, P. G. (2018). Extending truncated Poisson regression model time--risk model. Capture-Recapture Methods Social Medical Sciences (pp. 155-162). Chapman Hall/CRC.
